answers.answer: that is the correct dosage. maybe one thing he has got right. but i'm sure it is. 100% hope this helps
thanks girls:):)  gotta go take my aspirin now.

Just a question...why are some of you taking baby asprin, I have read a couple of threads in the last two months but no reason has been posted for taking the asprin....just trying to educate myself....good luck!!!
I take it for antiphospholipid antibody syndrome. It is a clotting disorder that can cause miscarriage.

I took it to help prevent preeclampsia.  I had it with my first pregnancy and pih with the next two.  Ironically with my last my Dr had me take 2 a day.  She said studies show that one just wasn't quite enough.  I ended up having my baby 8 weeks early due to super imposed pre eclapsia, severe proteinuria, pulmonary edema, HELLP Syndrome and chest heart failure.  Wonder what would of happen without the aspirin.
do you need a prescription from a dr for the baby asprin?

Isn't there some link between taking baby aspirin and progesterone supplements as well?I remember reading it some where....I am going to start taking the progesterone supplements in September when we try and conceive again after several miscarriages.I just didn't know if I was suppose to take the baby aspirin as well...forgot to ask my OB/GYN.

question: I have to take baby aspirin bc i had a stroke during my last pg.  I ordered it from the pharmacy and was sent pills of 81 mg. each.  It does not say it is baby aspirin, and i cann not reach my dr.  The pharmacist says this is the right dosage, but he hs ben wrong in the past and is unreliable.  Does anyone know what the correct mg. for baby aspirin is?  Thanks all, love you guys.
title: baby aspirin - correct dosage
